import React from 'react' const WeatherData = ({ data }) => { const { name, country, temp, id, main, description, temp_min, temp_max, icon, feels_like, speed, deg, humidity } = data; const playlist = [ { 'Thunderstorm': 'PlaceHolderForPlaylistIDForThunderstorm', 'Drizzle': 'PlaceHolderForPlaylistIDForDrizzle', 'Rain': 'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Snow': 'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Mist': 'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Smoke':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Haze':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Dust':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Fog':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Sand':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Ash':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Squall':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Tornado':'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Clear': 'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', 'Clouds': 'PlaceHolderForPlaylistID', } ]; if (main === 'Clouds'){ console.log(playlist[0].Haze); } return ( <>

{name}, {country}

{description}

{id}

{main}

Feels like {feels_like} 째C

{temp}째

Today's High {temp_max}째

Today's Low {temp_min}째

{icon}

{speed}
{deg}

Humidity: {humidity} %

); } export default WeatherData;
